mapper.select: select count(distinct dud.doctor_id) as typeSum,dv.client_level as type from doctor d inner join doctor_virtual dv on d.id=dv.doctor_id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id = dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and dud.prod_id=#{productId} group by dv.client_level

select count(distinct dud.doctor_id) as typeSum,dv.client_level as type from doctor d inner join doctor_virtual dv on d.id=dv.doctor_id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id = dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and date_format(dud.modify_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m') and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and dud.prod_id=#{productId} group by dv.client_level

select count(dud.doctor_id) as typeSum,dv.client_level as type from doctor d inner join ( select distinct t.doctor_id from(
select distinct vdci.virtual_doctor_id doctor_id from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join doctor d on vdci.virtual_doctor_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and vdcid.status_name='answer' and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and dud.prod_id=#{productId} and vdci.product_id=#{productId} and date_format(vdci.create_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m') group by vdci.virtual_doctor_id
union
select distinct ar.read_person_id doctor_id from activity_read ar inner join t_content_product tcp on ar.data_id=tcp.content_id inner join activity_info ai on tcp.content_id=ai.id inner join doctor d on ar.read_person_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and dud.prod_id=#{productId} and tcp.product_id=#{productId} and date_format(ar.create_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m')
group by ar.read_person_id
) t ) a on d.id=a.doctor_id inner join doctor_virtual dv on d.id=dv.doctor_id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id = dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and dud.prod_id=#{productId} group by dv.client_level

select distinct b.doctorId,b.doctorName,b.hospitalName,b.depart,b.doctorTel,b.level,b2.diff_days diffDays from ( select distinct d.id doctorId, d.name doctorName,d.hospital_name hospitalName,d.depart depart,d.telephone doctorTel,dv.client_level level from doctor d inner join doctor_virtual dv on d.id=dv.doctor_id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) b inner join ( select t.doctor_id,(to_days(now())-to_days(date_format(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d'))) as diff_days from ( select distinct vdci.virtual_doctor_id doctor_id,max(vdci.create_time) as create_time from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join doctor d on vdci.virtual_doctor_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and vdcid.status_name='answer' and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and dud.prod_id=#{productId} and vdci.product_id=#{productId}
group by vdci.virtual_doctor_id ) t where to_days(now())-to_days(date_format(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) >= 30 ) b2 on b.doctorId=b2.doctor_id group by b.level order by b2.diff_days desc limit #{currentSize},#{pageSize}

select count(1) from ( select distinct b.doctorId,b.level,b2.diff_days diffDays from ( select distinct d.id doctorId, d.name doctorName,d.hospital_name hospitalName,d.depart depart,d.telephone doctorTel,dv.client_level level from doctor d inner join doctor_virtual dv on d.id=dv.doctor_id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) b inner join ( select t.doctor_id,(to_days(now())-to_days(date_format(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d'))) as diff_days from ( select distinct vdci.virtual_doctor_id doctor_id,max(vdci.create_time) as create_time from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join doctor d on vdci.virtual_doctor_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and vdcid.status_name='answer' and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and dud.prod_id=#{productId} and vdci.product_id=#{productId}
group by vdci.virtual_doctor_id ) t where to_days(now())-to_days(date_format(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) >= 30 ) b2 on b.doctorId=b2.doctor_id group by b.level ) t

select ifnull(sum(vdci.call_time),0) as sum_call_time from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join drug_user du on vdci.virtual_drug_user_id = du.id where vdci.product_id=#{productId} and vdcid.status_name='answer'
and date_format(vdci.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vdci.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vdci.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vdci.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and vdci.virtual_doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} group by vdci.virtual_drug_user_id order by sum_call_time limit 1

select distinct t.num,t.drugUserName from ( select ifnull(sum(vdci.call_time),0) as num,du.name as drugUserName from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join drug_user du on vdci.virtual_drug_user_id = du.id where vdci.product_id=#{productId} and vdcid.status_name='answer'
and date_format(vdci.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vdci.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vdci.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vdci.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and vdci.virtual_doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} group by vdci.virtual_drug_user_id ) t where t.num=#{minCallTotalTime}

select (min(t.sum_call_time)/(if(ifnull(t.call_count,0)=0,1,t.call_count))) as minAvgCallTotalTime from ( select ifnull(sum(vdci.call_time),0) as sum_call_time,count(distinct vdci.id) as call_count,du.id, du.name from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join drug_user du on vdci.virtual_drug_user_id = du.id where vdci.product_id=#{productId} and vdcid.status_name='answer'
and date_format(vdci.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vdci.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vdci.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vdci.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and vdci.virtual_doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} group by vdci.virtual_drug_user_id ) t group by t.id order by minAvgCallTotalTime limit 1

select distinct a.drugUserName,a.num from ( select distinct t.name as drugUserName,(min(t.sum_call_time)/(if(ifnull(t.call_count,0)=0,1,t.call_count))) as num from ( select ifnull(sum(vdci.call_time),0) as sum_call_time,count(distinct vdci.id) as call_count,du.id, du.name from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join drug_user du on vdci.virtual_drug_user_id = du.id where vdci.product_id=#{productId} and vdcid.status_name='answer'
and date_format(vdci.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vdci.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vdci.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vdci.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and vdci.virtual_doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} group by vdci.virtual_drug_user_id ) t group by t.id ) a where a.num=#{minAvgCallTotalTime}

select ifnull(count(distinct vdci.id),0) as minCallCount from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join drug_user du on vdci.virtual_drug_user_id = du.id where vdci.product_id=#{productId} and vdcid.status_name='answer'
and date_format(vdci.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vdci.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vdci.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vdci.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and vdci.virtual_doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} group by vdci.virtual_drug_user_id order by minCallCount limit 1

select distinct t.num, t.drugUserName from ( select ifnull(count(distinct vdci.id),0) as num, du.name as drugUserName from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join drug_user du on vdci.virtual_drug_user_id = du.id where vdci.product_id=#{productId} and vdcid.status_name='answer'
and date_format(vdci.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vdci.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vdci.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vdci.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and vdci.virtual_doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} group by vdci.virtual_drug_user_id ) t where t.num = #{minCallCount}

select ifnull(count(distinct vdci.virtual_doctor_id),0) minCallCoveredCount from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join drug_user du on vdci.virtual_drug_user_id = du.id where vdci.product_id=#{productId} and vdcid.status_name='answer'
and date_format(vdci.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vdci.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vdci.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vdci.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and vdci.virtual_doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} group by vdci.virtual_drug_user_id order by minCallCoveredCount limit 1

select distinct t.num,t.drugUserName from ( select ifnull(count(distinct vdci.virtual_doctor_id),0) as num, du.name as drugUserName from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join drug_user du on vdci.virtual_drug_user_id = du.id where vdci.product_id=#{productId} and vdcid.status_name='answer'
and date_format(vdci.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vdci.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vdci.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vdci.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and vdci.virtual_doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} group by vdci.virtual_drug_user_id ) t where t.num=#{minCallCoveredCount}

select count(distinct vm.id) as minImCount from virtual_message vm inner join drug_user du on vm.drug_user_id=du.id where vm.product_id=#{productId} and vm.message_type=2 and vm.user_type=1
and date_format(vm.message_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vm.message_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vm.message_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vm.message_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and vm.doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vm.drug_user_id order by minImCount limit 1

select distinct t.num, t.drugUserName from ( select count(distinct vm.id) as num,du.name drugUserName from virtual_message vm inner join drug_user du on vm.drug_user_id=du.id where vm.product_id=#{productId} and vm.message_type=2 and vm.user_type=1
and date_format(vm.message_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vm.message_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vm.message_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vm.message_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and vm.doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vm.drug_user_id ) t where t.num = #{minImCount}

select count(distinct vm.doctor_id) as minImCoveredCount from virtual_message vm inner join drug_user du on vm.drug_user_id=du.id where vm.product_id=#{productId} and vm.message_type=2 and vm.user_type=1
and date_format(vm.message_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vm.message_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vm.message_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vm.message_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and vm.doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vm.drug_user_id order by minImCoveredCount limit 1

select t.num, t.drugUserName from ( select count(distinct vm.doctor_id) as num,du.name drugUserName from virtual_message vm inner join drug_user du on vm.drug_user_id=du.id where vm.product_id=#{productId} and vm.message_type=2 and vm.user_type=1
and date_format(vm.message_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vm.message_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vm.message_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vm.message_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and vm.doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vm.drug_user_id ) t where t.num=#{minImCoveredCount}

select count(distinct vm.id) as minWechatCount from virtual_message vm inner join drug_user du on vm.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and vm.message_type=1 and vm.user_type=1
and date_format(vm.message_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vm.message_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vm.message_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vm.message_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and vm.doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vm.drug_user_id order by minWechatCount limit 1

select distinct t.num, t.drugUserName from ( select count(distinct vm.id) as num,du.name drugUserName from virtual_message vm inner join drug_user du on vm.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and vm.message_type=1 and vm.user_type=1
and date_format(vm.message_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vm.message_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vm.message_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vm.message_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and vm.doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vm.drug_user_id ) t where t.num=#{minWechatCount}

select count(distinct vm.doctor_id) as minWechatCoveredCount from virtual_message vm inner join drug_user du on vm.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and vm.message_type=1 and vm.user_type=2
and date_format(vm.message_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vm.message_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vm.message_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vm.message_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and vm.doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vm.drug_user_id order by minWechatCoveredCount limit 1

select distinct t.num, t.drugUserName from ( select count(distinct vm.doctor_id) as num,du.name drugUserName from virtual_message vm inner join drug_user du on vm.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and vm.message_type=1 and vm.user_type=2
and date_format(vm.message_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vm.message_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vm.message_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vm.message_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and vm.doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vm.drug_user_id ) t

select ifnull(count(vei.id),0) as minEmailCount from virtual_email_info vei inner join drug_user du on vei.drug_user_id=du.id where vei.product_id= #{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath}
and date_format(vei.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vei.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vei.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vei.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and vei.doctor_id in ( select distinct d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id= du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vei.drug_user_id order by minEmailCount limit 1

select ifnull(count(vei.doctor_id),0) as minEmailCoveredCount from virtual_email_info vei inner join drug_user du on vei.drug_user_id=du.id where vei.product_id= #{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath}
and date_format(vei.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vei.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vei.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vei.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and vei.doctor_id in ( select distinct d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id= du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vei.drug_user_id order by minEmailCoveredCount limit 1

select distinct t.drugUserName from ( select ifnull(count(distinct vdci.virtual_doctor_id),0) as covered_count, du.name as drugUserName,vdci.virtual_drug_user_id as drugUserId from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join drug_user du on vdci.virtual_drug_user_id = du.id where vdci.product_id=#{productId} and vdcid.status_name='answer'
and date_format(vdci.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vdci.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vdci.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vdci.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and vdci.virtual_doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} group by vdci.virtual_drug_user_id ) t where t.covered_count < #{callReach}

select distinct t.drugUserName from ( select count(distinct vm.doctor_id) as message_count,du.name drugUserName,du.id as drugUserId from virtual_message vm inner join drug_user du on vm.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and vm.message_type=1 and vm.user_type=2
and date_format(vm.message_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vm.message_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vm.message_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vm.message_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and vm.doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vm.drug_user_id
) t where t.message_count < #{wechatReach}

select distinct t.drugUserName from ( select count(distinct vm.doctor_id) as message_count,du.name drugUserName,du.id as drugUserId from virtual_message vm inner join drug_user du on vm.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and vm.product_id = #{productId} and vm.message_type=2 and vm.user_type=2
and date_format(vm.message_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vm.message_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vm.message_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vm.message_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and vm.doctor_id in ( select d.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vm.drug_user_id
) t where t.message_count < #{imReach}

select count(distinct b.id) from ( select d.id,dv.client_level from doctor d inner join doctor_virtual dv on d.id=dv.doctor_id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and dv.client_level=#{level} ) b inner join
( select a.doctor_id,(to_days(now())-to_days(date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d'))) as diff_days from ( select distinct t.doctor_id,max(t.create_time) as create_time from ( select distinct vdci.virtual_doctor_id doctor_id,max(vdci.create_time) as create_time from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join doctor d on vdci.virtual_doctor_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and vdcid.status_name='answer' and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and dud.prod_id=#{productId} and vdci.product_id=#{productId} group by vdci.virtual_doctor_id
union
select distinct ar.read_person_id doctor_id, max(ar.create_time) as create_time from activity_read ar inner join t_content_product tcp on ar.data_id=tcp.content_id inner join activity_info ai on tcp.content_id=ai.id inner join doctor d on ar.read_person_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and dud.prod_id=#{productId} and tcp.product_id=#{productId}
group by ar.read_person_id ) t ) a where to_days(now())-to_days(date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) >= #{levelDropCount} ) b2
on b.id=b2.doctor_id

select count(distinct b.doctorId) as maxDropcount from( select distinct d.id doctorId,du.id drugUserId from doctor d inner join doctor_virtual dv on d.id=dv.doctor_id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id and dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and dv.client_level=#{level} ) b inner join
( select a.doctor_id,(to_days(now())-to_days(date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d'))) as diff_days from ( select distinct t.doctor_id,max(t.create_time) as create_time from ( select distinct vdci.virtual_doctor_id doctor_id,max(vdci.create_time) as create_time from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join doctor d on vdci.virtual_doctor_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and vdcid.status_name='answer' and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and dud.prod_id=#{productId} and vdci.product_id=#{productId} group by vdci.virtual_doctor_id
union
select distinct ar.read_person_id doctor_id, max(ar.create_time) as create_time from activity_read ar inner join t_content_product tcp on ar.data_id=tcp.content_id inner join activity_info ai on tcp.content_id=ai.id inner join doctor d on ar.read_person_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and dud.prod_id=#{productId} and tcp.product_id=#{productId}
group by ar.read_person_id ) t ) a where to_days(now())-to_days(date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) >= #{levelDropCount} ) b2
on b.doctorId=b2.doctor_id group by b.drugUserId order by maxDropcount limit 1

select ifnull(sum(vdci.call_time),0) as minCallTotalTime from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join doctor d on vdci.virtual_doctor_id = d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where vdci.product_id=#{productId} and vdcid.status_name='answer' and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath}
and date_format(vdci.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vdci.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vdci.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vdci.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and vdci.virtual_drug_user_id in ( select distinct du.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vdci.virtual_doctor_id order by minCallTotalTime limit 1

select (min(t.sum_call_time)/(if(ifnull(t.call_count,0)=0,1,t.call_count))) as minAvgCallTotalTime from ( select ifnull(sum(vdci.call_time),0) as sum_call_time,count(distinct vdci.id) as call_count,du.id, du.name from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join doctor d on vdci.virtual_doctor_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where vdci.product_id=#{productId} and vdcid.status_name='answer' and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath}
and date_format(vdci.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vdci.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vdci.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vdci.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and vdci.virtual_drug_user_id in ( select distinct du.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vdci.virtual_doctor_id ) t group by t.id order by minAvgCallTotalTime limit 1

select ifnull(count(distinct vdci.id),0) as minCallCount from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join doctor d on vdci.virtual_doctor_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where vdci.product_id=#{productId} and vdcid.status_name='answer' and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath}
and date_format(vdci.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vdci.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vdci.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vdci.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and vdci.virtual_drug_user_id in ( select distinct du.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} )
group by vdci.virtual_doctor_id order by minCallCount limit 1

select distinct t.num, t.doctorName from ( select ifnull(count(distinct vdci.id),0) as num,d.name doctorName from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join doctor d on vdci.virtual_doctor_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where vdci.product_id=#{productId} and vdcid.status_name='answer' and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath}
and date_format(vdci.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vdci.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vdci.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vdci.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and vdci.virtual_drug_user_id in ( select distinct du.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} )
group by vdci.virtual_doctor_id ) t where t.num=#{minCallCount}

select count(distinct vm.id) as minImCount from virtual_message vm inner join doctor d on vm.doctor_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where vm.product_id=#{productId} and vm.message_type=2 and vm.user_type=2
and date_format(vm.message_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vm.message_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vm.message_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vm.message_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and vm.drug_user_id in ( select distinct du.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vm.doctor_id order by minImCount limit 1

select distinct t.num,t.doctorName from ( select count(distinct vm.id) as num,d.name as doctorName from virtual_message vm inner join doctor d on vm.doctor_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where vm.product_id=#{productId} and vm.message_type=2 and vm.user_type=2
and date_format(vm.message_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vm.message_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vm.message_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vm.message_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and vm.drug_user_id in ( select distinct du.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vm.doctor_id ) t where t.num=#{minImCount}

select count(distinct vm.id) as minWechatCount from virtual_message vm inner join doctor d on vm.doctor_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and vm.message_type=1 and vm.user_type=2
and date_format(vm.message_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vm.message_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vm.message_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vm.message_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and vm.drug_user_id in ( select distinct du.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vm.doctor_id order by minWechatCount limit 1

select distinct t.num, t.doctorName from ( select count(distinct vm.id) as num,d.name as doctorName from virtual_message vm inner join doctor d on vm.doctor_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and vm.message_type=1 and vm.user_type=2
and date_format(vm.message_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vm.message_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vm.message_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vm.message_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and vm.drug_user_id in ( select distinct du.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vm.doctor_id ) t where t.num=#{minWechatCount}

select ifnull(count(vei.id),0) as minEmailCount from virtual_email_info vei inner join doctor d on vei.doctor_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where vei.product_id= #{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath}
and date_format(vei.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vei.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vei.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vei.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
and vei.drug_user_id in ( select distinct du.id from doctor d inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id= du.id where dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} ) group by vei.doctor_id order by minEmailCount limit 1

select ifnull(sum(tmad.attend_sum_time),0) minMeetingTime from t_meeting_attend_details tmad inner join t_meeting_data tma on tmad.meeting_id=tma.id inner join doctor d on tmad.doctor_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where tma.product_id=#{productId} and dud.prod_id=#{productId} and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath}
and date_format(tmad.attend_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(tmad.attend_end_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(tmad.attend_end_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(tmad.attend_end_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
group by tmad.doctor_id order by minMeetingTime limit 1

select ifnull(sum(vdci.call_time),0) from virtual_doctor_call_info vdci inner join virtual_doctor_call_info_details vdcid on vdci.id=vdcid.call_id inner join doctor d on vdci.virtual_doctor_id=d.id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where 1=1 and vdcid.status_name='answer' and du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and dud.prod_id=#{productId} and vdci.product_id=#{productId}
and date_format(vdci.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(vdci.create_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(vdci.create_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(vdci.create_time)=QUARTER(NOW())

select ifnull(sum(tmad.attend_sum_time),0) from t_meeting_attend_details tmad inner join t_meeting_data tma on tmad.meeting_id=tma.id inner join product_line pl on tma.product_id=pl.prod_id inner join doctor d on d.id=tmad.doctor_id inner join drug_user_doctor dud on d.id=dud.doctor_id inner join drug_user du on dud.drug_user_id=du.id where du.leader_path like #{leaderPath} and dud.prod_id=#{productId} and tma.product_id=#{productId}
and date_format(tmad.attend_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and WEEKOFYEAR(tmad.attend_end_time)=WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
and MONTH(tmad.attend_end_time)=MONTH(NOW())
and QUARTER(tmad.attend_end_time)=QUARTER(NOW())
